entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-38180: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #269
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-38178: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #268
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-35391: .NET Information Disclosure Vulnerability #267
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-35390: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #266
  • .NET August 2023 Updates #265

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json source generator does not work with required fields in records #90205
  • JIT: consider rewrite `movs` logic for struct copies #90196
    9.0.0
  • JIT: avoid calling GC write barrier for byrefs #90195
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.IO.Hashing.Adler32 class for computing Adler32 checksums #90191
  • Adjust error handling for new HttpClient metrics #90182
    8.0.0
  • Need add optimize Document for IlcScanReflection #90171
    Future
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-38180: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #90170
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-38178: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #90169
  • .NET 6 Blazor App high memory usage under Linux #90163
  • Is there a document for Coreclr on the Android platform #90160
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `FileStream.DefaultBufferSize` #90157
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Whitespace options on System.Xml.XmlTextWriter #90155
    Future
  • [hot reload][mono] Drop apply_enclog_pass1 #90153
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support > int.MaxValue records affected in ADO.NET #90151
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection ServiceProvider doesn't validate generic constraint. #90158
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Deep inlining of polymorphic recursion can cause hangs during JIT #90144
    8.0.0
  • [URI] Uri serialization is missing Scheme #90140
    Future
  • [Mono] Calling a virtual static method on an interface in Debug mode causes a crash #90139
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `ImmutableCollectionsMarshal.AsSpan(ImmutableArray<T>.Builder)` #90138
  • get attributes from objects created on runtime #90164
  • LoadJit function failing in CLR #90135
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT Libraries support for `DllImportSearchPath.AssemblyDirectory` is undefined #90131
    Future

Closed

  • Debug.Assert when using ReceiveFrom on UnixDomainSocket #78448
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: add overloads with SocketAddress to Socket's SendTo and ReceiveFrom #87397
    8.0.0
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] [Proposal] Separate cleanup stages into CleanupIn and CleanupOut #89791
    8.0.0
  • Cleanup `out` parameters in guarded `if` #89896
    8.0.0
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] ManagedToUnmanagedStubs with 'out' or return value size may not have correct size or array pointer when cleaning up #89747
    8.0.0
  • Cleanup `[Out]` elements in guarded `if` #89897
    8.0.0
  • Possible optimisation for derefencing a span pointer #80086
    8.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator does not allocate an array to pass as [Out] parameter in CCW #87845
    8.0.0
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] [Out] arrays will free the 'original' elements in unmanaged to managed stubs when marshalling back to native callee #89968
    8.0.0
  • Crash on using Expression.Compile() in a release mode (iOS). #69410
    8.0.0
  • [S.P.CoreLib]System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat._value errors when publish with PublishReadyToRun #79965
    8.0.0
  • .NET 6 - R2R Composite image crashes the app #65879
    8.0.0
  • Casting via generic math doesn't always inline in R2R #84421
    8.0.0
  • Activity Tracking option for logger factory works differently for tags and baggage #90071
    8.0.0
  • .net 8 publish failed with error "An item with the same key has already been added" #89234
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests failure #84767
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `CollectionsMarshal.AsMemory(List<T>)` #90141
  • Vector128.ShiftRightLogical doesn't use machine-instructions for some types (`byte` / `sbyte`) #75770
    8.0.0
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] PreserveSig with collection return type will not properly marshal back to caller #89893
  • Use cross-platform code to update apphost win32 resources, open apphost only once for writing #3828
    8.0.0
  • CreateAppHost fails processing Win32 resources #88465
  • NativeAOT fails to resolve PInvoke in `System.Data.SqlClient` #89874
    8.0.0
  • Question / Suggestion: Allow managed exports (UnmanagedCallersOnly) in non AOT scenarios. #90126
  • TypedReference.ToObject tests failing on Mono #70091
    9.0.0
  • When calculating xxhash, net7.0 is slower than net6.0 #90090
    8.0.0
  • Json outerloop test failure "Reflection-based serialization has been disabled" #90121
    8.0.0
  • is there any solution pass object to native like mono #90134
  • GetActiveTcpConnections throw PlatformNotSupportedException on linux if IPV6 not enabled #88975
    6.0.x
  • Reducing Managed Libraries Testing Infrastructure Size #45126
    8.0.0
  • Concurrent exceptions might cause createdump to fail #82989
    9.0.0
  • Installing newer Microsoft.AspNetCore.App without same Microsoft.NETCore.App breaks FX resolution #90096
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'size != 0' during 'Generate code' #78891
    8.0.0
  • Regex generator doesn't work when using statements only come from other generators #89923
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/SIMD/VectorConvert_ro_Target_64Bit/VectorConvert_ro_Target_64Bit.cmd #90083
    8.0.0
  • Arm32: System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.Tests failing with NRE #80857
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing `Dictionary` by `string` key #76013
    8.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator assumes [In, Out] for arrays of blittable elements that are pinned in ManagedToUnmanaged, but doesn't implement [In, Out] in UnmanagedToManaged #89265
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [RISC-V] Initial commit for libraries directory #90203
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add metrics configuration APIs #90201
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Do not OCSP staple invalid OCSP responses #90200
    area-System.Net.Security
  • PoC: enable AIA tests on Mariner #90199
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add debug information to System.Diagnostics.Tracing ETW test to help track down intermittent failures #90198
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Use current runtime version in ILLink.Tasks package #90197
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Incremental build improvements #90194
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Remove dbgshim from platform manifest #90193
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix up `InlineArray` tests #90192
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #90190
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.x
  • [browser] fix order of libraryInitializers execution #90189
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Reword diagnostic about which types can use [out], remove unused diagnostics #90188
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix Dragon4 tutorial URL #90186
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Propagate struct zeroing #90185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Baseline Native AOT tests (#86366)" #90184
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Abort host startup before the next phase #90183
    area-Extensions-Hosting, 8.0.0
  • [iOS] Disable failing CI tests #90181
    needs-area-label
  • Enable support for generic methods with IDIC #90180
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Bump timeouts on Android/iOS devices jobs #90178
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Align V512 reads in IndexOf. #90177
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger]Evaluate a sum between an object and a string #90175
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Explicitly set SizeConst = 1 and remove the warning suppression #90174
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [release/7.0-staging] [hot_reload] ignore modified MONO_TABLE_TYPEDEF rows in update #90172
    Servicing-consider, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.x
  • [hot_reload] ignore modified MONO_TABLE_TYPEDEF rows in update #90166
    area-EnC-mono
  • Improvements to Banned APIs #90165
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Make getStaticFieldContent less conservative for struct with gc fields #90162
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Debugger IPC creation failure should not abort coreclr startup #90161
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make {u}int/{u}long/n{u}int.CompareTo branch-free #90156
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance
  • Avoid looking for dynamically accessed members when none are requested. #90154
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Add LLVM-AOT support to the sample app #90152
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Enable isolates storage tests on maccatalyst #90150
    area-System.IO, os-maccatalyst
  • Switch DateTimeKind from Unspecified to Local #90149
    area-System.Management, community-contribution
  • [browser] doc node SIMD+EH #90147
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [browser] bind JS methods to minified WASM imports #90145
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the `la.local` between the JIT_PatchedCodeStart #90143
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [iOS][Android] Fix up library mode build #90133
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove some unnecessary indirection to DiagnosticServerAdapter/EventPipeAdapter in nativeaot #90132
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • List unsupported architectures in area-owners #90128
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Add Fact #90202
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • add ReceiveFromAsync and SendToAsync with SocketAddress overload #90086
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • PinnedMarshal after marshalling in unmanaged to managed #90117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • By value out fixes #89982
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [RISC-V] Add g_GCShadowEnd to JIT_WriteBarrier_Table #90036
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add EnableDiagnostics sub-configs for IPC, debugger, and profiler #90159
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #90179
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #90173
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.x
  • Fix Activity Baggage logging scope #90127
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Read `AssetTraitValue` to get culture for resource during webcil transformation #89600

    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.x
  • Use correct marshaller for elements #90176

  • Change generation for NonGC objects for debugger #89927

  • Serialize createdump core dump generation #90130
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [iOS] Remove cmake build dependency for library mode #89869
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [JIT] Do not force creation of a new IG if the current IG has no instructions #89876

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-08
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Move liveness and SSA before LSSA #2370

Updated

  • ManagedZLib: Console app for profiling inflate #2368
  • ManagedZLib: Porting Deflate from C ZLib #2367

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Report "preview" more classy #34526
  • Allow customization of OS X Code Sign utility #34514
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-35390: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #34510
  • `dotnet tool install --local --no-cache` ignoring the `--no-cache` flag for locally built packages #34508
  • Warning caused by EnableAOTAnalyzer points to IsAotCompatible #34505
  • Dotnet: Multi-target projects require all 'TargetFrameworks' installed in order to build #34496

Closed

  • msbuild.exe is only available in visual studio right? #34020
  • How to build SDK? #14966
  • dotnet new locks after execution #14750
  • `dotnet run` help doesn't show help about `--urls` #34386
  • remove EnableWindowsTargeting #34495

PullRequests

Created

  • Support option to not include platform #34530
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #34529
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #34527
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #34525
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #34523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #34521
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #34516
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle unknown version in EnvironmentInfo test helper #34519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #34513
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the hard code of newtonsoft package version #34266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • don't copy over the .dotnet dependencies if they are already there #34459
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #34518
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #34515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2238645 #34520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #34512
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #34511
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add implementation and test for the DisableRuntimeMarshalling attribute. #34388
    untriaged

Updated

  • Remove a nowarn line added for preview 1 #34345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • One option for fixing the locked file issue in the test #34307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • First-run workload experience #34322
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Support Records in GenAPI #34433
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • Add ProjectCapability for Native AOT properties. #34485
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Add a concept of image family to container base image inference #33163
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test plan for "method group natural type improvements" #69432
    17.9

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34008.209 #69433
  • Recursive type triggers Roslyn stack overflow and crashes Visual Studio #68223
    17.8
  • The default language version for `net8.0` needs to be 12.0 #69109
    17.8
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34007.311 #69428
  • EnC: Inline Arrays #69245
  • Rude edits not detected when changing (primary) constructor initializer #68731

PullRequests

Created

  • Expose fix all for refactorings as an experimental public API #69430
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add analyzer/fixer to recommend updating stackalloc expressions to use collection expressions. #69414
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add LSP Simplify Method for Razor #69323
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix constraint cycle through nested type of base type #69242
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Adjust OptProf config #69370
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Record lambda optional parameters in C# 12 #69431
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Add LanguageVersion for C# 12 #69383
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add LanguageName to telemetry information passed in for CodeRefactoring_Delay and CodeFix_Delay telemetry calls #69350
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add an LSP notification for loading projects #69427
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Do not use cached CompilationWithAnalyzers which don't contain all an… #69419
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Enable tests for #68731 #69193
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Add server->client notification to show project load failures #69424
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Workaround issues with Uri escaping certain Unicode characters #69304
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix analyzer conflicts on Linux #69406
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for assembly/module-level `[Experimental]` and contextual suppression #69316
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Add fuzzer for incremental generators #68903
    Area-Compilers, Test, 17.8
  • Support converting arrays, whose elements are assigned afterwards, to a collection expression. #69415
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • SyntaxGenerator handle explicit interface indexer #69285
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Recommend 'using static' before a top-level statement #69346
    Area-IDE
  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, 17.9
  • Method group natural type: only use methods that can be fully substituted and pass constraint checks #69226
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, 17.9
  • Collection expressions: emit Array.Empty<T>() for [] with target type T[] or IEnumerable<T> #69355
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix issues where internal pattern matching state was being copied #69336
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve EOL consistency for Add Using #69309
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Verify synthesized `RequiresLocationAttribute` cannot be accessed by fnptrs #69328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • A better descriptor Id for an F# analyzer #69313
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Unify `ref readonly` with `in` parameter behavior where it currently differs #69235
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.8
  • Implementation for Regex QuickInfo Provider and it includes documentation for Regular Expressions. #69405
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve error report on HotReloadAgent #49941
  • Rehydrate invalid form data on Blazor SSR. #49939
  • Add support for running actions during routing #49936
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #49934
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, plaintext, single_query #49933
  • Unify ViewBuffer logic between MVC and Blazor #49932
  • Base Href Changing Or Normal Refresh #49931
  • Calling Minimal API with IFormFile gets "Invalid anti-forgery token" #49929
  • 7.0 failing test: POST_ServerCompletesWithoutReadingRequestBody_ClientGetsResponse #49926
    8.0-rc2
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-35391: .NET Information Disclosure Vulnerability #49924
  • Blazor route constraint does not work. #49921
    8.0-rc2
  • In Blazor wasm, the overriden BuildRenderTree is not hit at all #49917
  • Identity register sends an email even SignIn.RequireConfirmedEmail is false #49914
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plainTextSansFilter #49912

Closed

  • SignalR connection doesn't work without setting skipNegotiation to true in NextJS #49918
  • Deterministically resolve the "auto" render mode to "server" or "webassembly" #49580
    8.0-rc1
  • StaticHtmlRenderer uses synchronous writes which eventually fails #49172
    8.0-rc1
  • BUG on API Android API 16 #49905
  • Perf improvement: single_query #49910
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #49915
  • NETCore.App and AspNetCore.App versions mismatch #49625
  • Configuration of MessagePackProtocol IFormatterResolver(s) for SignalR with Redis backplane for ASP.NET Core SignalR scale-out #49894
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware could allow custom code to decide whether to log or not #39200
    8.0-preview5
  • SignalR not working on windows server 2019 #49656
    Backlog
  • Configuring LogLevel via environment variables in "standard" docker images #49899

PullRequests

Created

  • [SignalR][TS client] Stateful reconnect #49940
    area-signalr, feature-client-javascript
  • Avoid Redis pattern matching #49938
    area-signalr
  • Add support for options in form-binding and anti-forgery #49935
    area-mvc, area-minimal

Merged

  • Add a .http file to WebAPI project template #49561
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Improve auto render mode selection strategy #49858
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • Remove internal archives #49879
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Forcibly close socket on abort #49927
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 8.0-rc1
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #49925
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 7.0.11
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #49923
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 6.0.22
  • Merging internal commits for release/2.1 #49922
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 2.1.x
  • Support view buffer-based rendering in Blazor #49860
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • Return LockedOut from TwoFactorSignInAsync #49337
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-rc1
  • Disable CrossgenOutput for loongarch64 architecture #49862
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-rc1
  • Improve debugger display in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http #49861
    area-runtime, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23407.2 #49911
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix some trim warnings in Components.Endpoints #49890
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2238685 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Support NativeAOT in PropertySetter #49897
    area-blazor
  • Enable navigation when RenderModeServer #49768
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Fix flaky tests CanCacheRouteTable #49680
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update debugger display to use a consistent format #49898
    area-mvc
